EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.ExecYachtS1PConfirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Executive Yacht Cruise at SpringOne Platform | Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Executive Yacht Cruise on September 26 during SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?gclid=EAIaIQobChMIrOeY6vqA3QIV0QOGCh0kBwFuEAAYASAAEgKQcfD_BwE]]>.
Date: Wednesday, September 26, 2018
Time:
7:00PM to 10:00PM
Location: National Elite Yacht National Harbor Fort Washington, MD 2074 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/The+Capital+Wheel/@38.7856314,-77.019161,15z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0x3a441011509144cf!8m2!3d38.7856314!4d-77.019161]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:%20fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/Executive-Yacht-Cruise-S1P-2018.html]]>
